alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and northern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/... At 627 PM EDT/527 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blountstown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Hosford, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Clio, Kennys Mill, Lowry, Blountstown Airport, Hugh Creek, Telogia, Red Oak, Sharpstown, Nettle Ridge and Woods. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
